title: Old Judge box, Allen & Ginter tin for sale
author: drumback

posts.post_title: Old Judge box, Allen & Ginter tin for sale
posts.post_content:
Allen & Ginter Dixie tin measures 4.5 by 3.25 and is in very nice condition.  Hinges are excellent, lid opens and closes smoothly and securely.  Old Judge box patented March 5, 1878.  SOLD

Helmar box still has five cigarettes inside.  SOLD

Pair of Recruit boxes, one good condition, one poor  SOLD

Piedmont box dated 1925 (scan shows back of box, not front) VG  SOLD

Mark
